titleStmt.title: Which is the true church? the whole Christian world, as headed only by Christ ... or, the Pope of Rome and his subjects as such? : in three parts ... / by Richard Baxter ...
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Janeway ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

(from t.p.) I. The papists confusion in explaining the terms of the questions, not able to bear the light -- II. A defence of a disputation concerning the continued visibility of the church of which the Protestants are members -- III. A defence of the several additional proofs of the said visibility.
